song_lyrics: Tame Naṭvar Nand-kishor chho ghaṇu pyārā re,
Tamane mīṭethī Mohanlāl karu nahi nyārā re. ṭek.
Tam kāraṇ me to Shāmaḷā re sarve tajyo sansār;
Tam sang bāndhī prītaḍī mārī alabelā ek tār. Chho. 1
Mandir māre Māvajī re raho rasiyā sukh-deṇ;
Mukhaḍu tamāru joīne mārā trapat na thāye neṇ. Chho. 2
Āsh ghaṇī chhe antare re, shu kahī dākhu sujāṇ;
Tam sang ramavā kāraṇe me to kīdhu tan kurbān. Chho. 3
Aṇadīṭhe alabelḍā re, palak kalap sam jāy;
Muktānandnā Nāthjī have tam vinā kem revāy. Chho. 4
title: Tame Naṭvar Nand-kishor chho ghaṇu pyārā re

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-1079: Sadguru Muktanand Swami

Category: Murtina Pad
